overview:
Sales Executive with over ten years of advertising sales and management experience in online and mobile advertising. Proven track record of exceeding goals and maintaining excellent customer service and relationships at both direct client and agency levels.

Strategic mind with a passion for selling creative advertising solutions through a consultative sales approach.

Experience building out, brainstorming and bringing to market new ad products including the supporting marketing materials.

Passionate about leadership and bringing a team mentality to sales organizations focusing on results and mentorship.

degrees.subject: Business Administration, Marketing. Technical Communication.
degrees.institution: Cal Poly University, San Luis Obispo
